text: 7.5 Jol 2.16, Sek 7.3, 1 Te 3.5 Anɨb ak nɨgɨmɨl agek bin ne mel ma agɨnɨmuŋ, bin ne agek nɨgɨmɨl mel ma agɨnɨmuŋ. Yaw agɨl kɨnɨmil. Pen ñɨli ñɨn wulep ak God nop gos nɨŋɨd agnɨgɨlɨg mɨdol agɨl, takaw ag adek nokom lɨl, nop agnɨgɨlɨg yenɨmil. Agnɨgɨlɨg yenɨmil ak pen, kɨdek ñɨn wulep ak tepayaŋ ayɨp kɨnɨgayl. Mel ak Satan nɨbop gek, mubwak nab okyaŋ ke kod ma mɨdɨl, apyap pakɨnɨmil tek lɨnɨgab.
